short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to export X/Twitter search result list to CSV. Save all tweet feeds and user info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape and Extract X/Twitter Search result list, Save search tweet feed list and user info list to CSV / Excel / JSON.

HOW TO USE?
1. Enter a X/Twitter Search link
2. Click the start button
